specification.preconditions: - There are no preconditions, the method will always work.
specification.postconditions:
- The resulting array s has a size equal to operations.length + 1.
- The first element of s is 0.
- For every index i with 0 ≤ i < s.size - 1, s[i+1]? is some (s[i]! + operations[i]!).
- The boolean result is true if and only if there exists an index i (1 ≤ i ≤ operations.length) such that s[i]! < 0; otherwise, it is false.
